form.shortDescriptionValidation: A short description for your campaign is required
form.amountToRaiseTypeValidation: Minimum Amount must be a number
form.amountToRaiseMin: Minimum amount must be at least 1
form.maximumAmountToRaiseTypeValidation: Maximum Amount must be a number
form.maximumAmountToRaiseMin: Maximum amount to raise must be at least 2
form.maximumAmountToRaiseLarger: Maximum amount to raise must be larger than amount to raise
form.maximumTicketsPerInvestorRequired: Maximum tickets per investor is required

form.maximumTicketsPerInvestorMax: Maximum tickets per investor can't be more than maximum amount
form.maximumTicketsPerInvestorTypeValidation: Maximum tickets per investor must be number
form.ticketValueMin: Ticket Value must be at least 1
form.ticketValueInfo: Ticket value represents the minimum amount investment that can be done by a GadgetBid investor.

details.firstMessage: I know you are eager to start your first crowdfunding campaign, but please wait for GadgetBid to finish due diligence process!
details.thirdMessage: Do not hesitate to reach out us for any clarification needed!
details.hiGadgetBid: Hi GadgetBid hero! I know you are eager to start your first crowdfunding campaign, but please fill your company profile and wait for GadgetBid team to finish the due diligence process! Keep you posted! Do no hesitate to reach out us for any clarification needed!

managerOverview.section: section in order to see the

general.veriffTooltip: This file is uploaded during the KYC process.
general.documentTableTooltip: Please make sure you upload a .pdf, .png, or .jpeg file
general.documentTableTooltipPpt: Please make sure you upload a .ppt, .pdf, .png, or .jpeg file
general.pdfTooltip: Please make sure you upload a .pdf file.
general.20MbTooltip:
Please make sure you upload a .pdf or .xls file. 
 File uploads must be 20 MB or smaller.
general.tabTooltip: You still have some things left to do at this step. Once you’re done, the red dot will disappear.
general.powerOfAttorney:
We need this document only if you are not one of the company legal representatives as per Incorporation Document and you have been appointed to act on their behalf. 
 Please make sure you upload a .pdf, .png or .jpeg file.
general.certificateOfStatus:
This document certifies that a company is properly registered with the state, is up to date on all state registration fees and required document filings, and is legally permitted to engage in business activities in the state.
 This document should be issued by the Trade Registry and not older than 3 months.
 Please make sure you upload a .pdf, .png or .jpeg file.
general.incorporationDocument:
This should be the legal document reflecting the formation of your company. (in Romania known as ‘act constitutiv’). 
 Please make sure you upload a .pdf, .png, or .jpeg file.
general.tradeRegistryCertificate:
This should be the registration certificate provided by the National Trade Register Office. 
 Please make sure you upload a.pdf, .png, or .jpeg file.

campaign.presubscribeInfo: By presubscribing you can select a number of tickets to invest in this company and once the crowdfunding campaign is live you will already have an investment
campaign.presubscribeUpdateInfo: Hello ! You have previously presubscribed to this campaign with the following ticket amount:
campaign.presubscribeUpdateConfirm: Would you like to update your presubscription ?

presubscribeSuccessModal.message: You have successfully presubscribed to the crowdfunding campaign.

details.news: Stay tuned for post investment news!

finish.checkEmailInbox: Check your email inbox. An investor agreement draft was sent to you.
finish.tryingToVerifyYouProblem: There was a problem while verifying your documents, please start the process again by clicking the button below:
finish.tryingToVerifyYou: Please wait, your documents are still being processed.

save.investToCampaign: You had already invested in this campaign
save.investToCampaignRisksOne:
Risk awareness
Investing in companies on
save.investToCampaignRisksThree:
is a great endeavor, and yet not a risk free one.
Crowd-investing, as well as any other venture undertaking, involves a high degree of risk and may result in partial or total loss of invested capital.
All investors should verify any issuer information they consider important before making an investment. We also strongly recommend consulting the Risk Warnings mentioned in the Membership Agreement & Investor Agreement.
save.changeYourInvestment: Would you like to change your investment from
save.saveYourInvestment: Clicking this button will confirm your investment

wizard.patienceIsEverything: Patience is everything. Please, do not refresh this page. The KYC process may take while.
wizard.info: Please select the number of tickets you want to invest in this company. There might be a superior limit set by the issuer, or only a few tickets left until reaching the campaign target.

kycRedirect.info: The KYC process is a simple and fast verification process that allows us to confirm and verify the authenticity of your identity.
kycRedirect.redirected:
To start the KYC process, please click the button below.
You will be redirected.

investPendingMessage.crowdfundingCampaigns: Currently we do not have any crowdfunding campaigns in which to invest.
investPendingMessage.opportunities: Available opportunities for investments will be listed here.
investPendingMessage.makeSomeInvestments: Once you make some investments you will see their details here.

QRCode.spvCreation: Once the SPV is created, you are eligible to receive your SPV tokenized shares according to your investment.
QRCode.allYouHaveToDo: All you have to do is:
QRCode.step1: Step 1: Make sure you have the Maiar wallet app downloaded on your phone
QRCode.step2: Step 2: Create an account on Maiar wallet
QRCode.step3: Step 3: Connect your Maiar account to Rōnin using WalletConnect
QRCode.step4: Step 4: Open Maiar app and go to WalletConnect
QRCode.step6: Step 6: Approve the connection and you're done!
QRCode.wellDone: Well done! You’re all set now.

browseLayout.browseOverComponents: Browse through over 100 individual components and over 35 screens

feedbackForms.errorMessage: Please select one or more reasons

presubscribeRadioCancelForm.header: GadgetBid wishes to improve continously and to provided the best investment opportunities. We would like to know what made you to cancel the campaign presubscription process. We kindly ask you to select one or more reasons that made you unsubscribe from the list below
presubscribeRadioCancelForm.answer1: This company does not activate in my domain of interest
presubscribeRadioCancelForm.answer2: The company's bussines plan is not convincing
presubscribeRadioCancelForm.answer3: The company is facing tough competition in their domain
